Name: Bamboo Forest
About the game: Bambo Forest Send your Panda on an adventure and at the same time you'll learn how to code cool algorithms! Learn programming / STEM concepts like recursion and loops while having fun. But beware! Don't get caught while eating bamboo! Guide your Panda through colorful areas by using simple commands. The Goal Reach the end of the levels Eat all the bamboo Avoid getting caught by the enemies The Gameplay Make a combination of instructions by dragging and dropping them to the programming areas. Forward Backward Turn Right Turn Left Wait Function Press Play To let the Panda execute these commands in order from top to bottom. After each command your enemies get to walk too!
